dmca.title: Painter Requests Takedown of Political Images
dmca.body:
Blogger.com
1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy
Mountain View, CA 94043

November 2, 2006 

To Whom It May Concern

It was recently brought to our attention that your site, directly or at the request of one of your users, displays multiple uses of a copyrighted image from one of the artists we represent, without a valid grant of permission.

The link to that image is as follows: http://rising-hegemon.blogspot.com/2005/09/odius-picture-contest.html

The image is entitled Praying for Peace by Ron DiCianni and is copyrighted with all rights reserved to the artist. As Ron DiCianni
